name: NBCNews
text: A Nashville man walked free this week after serving nearly 15 years of a lifetime sentence for a 1998 murder for which he was wrongfully convicted. https://t.co/Odj0Op1bBL

name: NBCNews
text: Thousands of Pres. Trump's supporters gathered in Washington, DC to protest the election results and echoed his unfounded claims of voter fraud. The events were promoted by Pres. Trump and far-right extremist groups, including members of the Proud Boys. https://t.co/gv22MPnCHY

name: NBCNews
text: Pres. Trump stonewalling President-elect Biden's transition not only breaks with tradition, but also endangers national security, numerous former government officials and experts said. https://t.co/vrpr1ITpeD

name: NBCNews
text: US Supreme Court Justice Alito lamented that opposing same-sex marriage is now "considered bigotry" in a speech to the Federalist Society. He took aim at the landmark 2015 Obergefell v. Hodges decision that guaranteed gay marriage rights across the US. https://t.co/kQZ7l33SAs

name: NBCNews
text: Students for Fair Admissions, a group who filed a lawsuit against Harvard University, claim Asian Americans face intentional discrimination in the admissions process. However, research shows 70% of Asian Americans support affirmative action. https://t.co/krq2ejwuYx
